phrases: Reina-chan, do you like sweet buns?
Then Rin, pour some barley tea for Reina-chan.
You came right during snack time!
I want to eat snacks, too!
I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as I Am with you, I Am happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
This is the first time I have had it!
This is my first time here, but it is like Grandpa's house...
You bring a school satchel over on a Sunday...
Actually, we... ran away from home.
The folks at the house will worry!
And is there something with his parents there...
That is part of it, too!
I-I guess it is difficult living with your husband's parents...?
I wonder if peaceful cohabitation between a wife and her in-laws even exists...
I have no brothers or sisters and there is nowhere else for me to go.
That is the arithmetic book we use, too!
Let me see your other textbooks, too!
F-First, let us talk things through.
Your Japanese book is different than mine!
I did not say where we were going, though...
And I will take Reina to school...
I have not given it much thought.
I have not even told my parents yet...
Have not given it much thought?
You have got your daughter with you...
Well, I had no other choice!
I just had to get out of that house!
I could not stand it another second!
For now, why do not we go grocery shopping for tonight?
I do not have anything, but you can use the room on the right.
What the hell did you cram in here?!
Reina's slippers and textbooks are in there, too...
I am surprised you made it this far.
Dai-chan, usually you just make do with whatever, right?
Well, tonight I will cook you a decent meal.
I do not just make do!
Daikichi, can we look at the sweets?
You can each choose one thing.
What kind of meat should we get?
It is all the same to me.
Dai-chan, this ground beef and pork combo is really cheap...
This is not what it looks like!
This is Haruko, my cousin from my mother's side!
Who cares what side I am from?
My son is a classmate of Rin-chan, and I am always obliged to Daikichi-san...
What the hell am I saying?!
She did not ask who it was!
Why did I feel the need to explain it to her?!
Then my daughter is the same age.
This is not what it looks like!
She is a first-grader from this year, so...
What kind of sweets did you pick?
I am getting vegetable sponge cake!
I am getting Meow Meow Kitty candy!
She is pretty, is not she?
Y-Yeah, I suppose she is one of the more attractive moms...
But I do not think you should have an affair with her!
A-Are you out of your mind?!
It is not like that at all!
In the first place, she has enough trouble just taking care of Kouki on her own,
You watch too many weird dramas!
A bug got out of its cage!
I am guessing she is two or three years older than we are...
W-What the hell do I care about how old she is?!
I do not know the details...
I have not had this before!
Usually, everything is made to my mother-in-law's taste.
Mama, I want to have this at home, too!
Well, thank you for the food we are about to eat.
Thank you for the food we are about to eat!
Thank you for the food we are about to eat...
Do not pull on it like that!
It seems they were both excited.
I moved Rin-chan to your futon, Dai-chan.
It is been so long since I had alcohol.
I gain weight easily these days, so no thanks.
I just meant, now that we have hit our thirties...
I would be happy just to be 30 again...
You cannot act the same as when you were younger, you know?
You have got to be careful.
On the other hand, my husband does not look at me anymore...
It is like, who am I making an effort for?
While you were all taking a bath, I called your house.
Do not do anything weird, Dai-chan!
You want everyone there to worry about you?!
All I said was that you two were fine and are going to stay here for a while.
I did not even give my address.
I told you already, I left a note!
You can do what you want, but there is Reina to consider.
Reina's with me and she is doing fine, so there is no problem!
Even if that is true, if you do not tell them where you are and that Reina's okay,
how the hell are the people who are waiting going to know?
I do not care about the people who are waiting...
You need to be a little more level-headed about this.
Do you just want to make trouble for your family?!
Papa and Mama are always fighting.
Even though they are married, but I always pretend like I am sleeping...
Ever since I got married, I have been living with my feelings bottled up!
I think I deserve to cause them at least a little trouble!
I should not have said those things.
You are up early today, huh?
W-What do you think I am?!
And when we use the stove, I...
Look, you have got rice on your face.
Do not take too long eating.
We are going to school by train today...
Kouki's mom is busy, so he always comes over early.
Then like I figured, you are not going to get married, huh?
What is like I figured supposed to mean?!
Daikichi, do you want to get married?
Look, I do not even know...
Mama, for you, single is better, right?
Reina-chan, your mom is married but single is better...
Daikichi, you are single, but is married better for you?
Adults really are weird, you know?
Daikichi, can I have a rice ball?
You had breakfast before coming, did not you?
It was supposed to be for me, though...
You are good-natured to a fault, Dai-chan.
I had one because I wanted one!
What,because I gave him a rice ball?
You must be just as busy as she is, right?
You really must have a thing for that beautiful mother...
I just thought I could help her out a little, is all...
And Rin gets along with them, too, so...
But that is all it is.
I do not know the details,
but I am pretty sure Kouki and his mother have been through a lot.
It would be rude of me to be too forward.
It must be hard, being a woman on her own...
I told you before, if you do not hurry up, you are going to be late!
Mama always has just one piece of toast.
She says she is on a diet.
It is a secret that we are staying with Daikichi.
Reina-chan, did you come with your mother?
We secretly ran away from home, so I came by train today!
Did not I tell you to hold onto it tight?!
I am not going to get another one for you!
But maybe it will get home before us!
Yeah, my husband's watching him at home.
Actually, he is so rambunctious these days, he is more than I can handle.
But it is nice that your husband helps out.
His business trip was suddenly rescheduled, so he has the day off.
There is no way I can rely on my husband to raise our kid.
They fell asleep right away tonight.
You do not intend to make a big thing of this, do you?
Oh, you mean divorce or something like that?
I wasted time worrying about it.
Well, I have thought about it any number of times...
In fact, I think about it almost every day...
After all, if I come to think of my husband as the enemy
while living in his family's house...
Except for Reina, they are all enemies to me.
I think of just the two of us as family.
But that is not being realistic, is it?
There is Reina... and the question of my ability to earn a living...
And all the problems I would have to face before I could reach that point...
In my case, at the end of the day, it looks like I am better off where I am.
I got engaged soon after I joined the company...
When I was young, all I thought about was becoming a good wife.
I have no choice... do I?
And that is the only way I can protect Reina...
You know, I have never been married, but it seems like it is hard,
Dai-chan, you do it all by yourself.
Nah, I have not been able to do anything for her.
When she is cooking for you, for example...
Kouki-kun and his mom are doing their best too, with just the two of them.
So Reina and I can hang in there.
All this the two of us...
Do you talk to your husband about this?
Mmm, he works overtime every night and we never have a decent conversation.
That is why Reina and I will do our best.
Besides, I have been putting up with it for years now.
I am sure I can keep at it.
As long as I try to not feel anything, I can hold out, more or less.
My health would be messed up if I did not do that.
Mmm, I do not know about that...
After you give birth and raise a kid,
there are times when you need enormous strength, right?
Especially when they are still a baby...
I do not know what it is like with a baby, but...
And while you are keeping that up, for some reason...
I really do not want to be an old woman...
I never wanted to become strong, especially...
If I could, I would be a girl forever...
What does it mean to become a parent?
Papa's coming after he finishes his work.
You know he would not be this early.
I am positive it is Papa!
It is not him, I say!
I was worried about you, Reina.
So if he wants to get off work at this time, he can, huh?
Hey, do not put it like that!
It is tough working for a company, too...
Haruko caused you so much trouble...
I really do not know what to say...
I am wearing the wrong clothes!
You would think Papa would at least carry our bags, right?
If you ever feel like it, you can come back anytime.
I cannot put you out more than I already have.
That is not what I mean.
Rin is always saying that she wants to see Reina-chan.
Then can we come again on Sunday?
When she was a girl, Haruka was a crybaby.
Last night, she muttered that she wanted to stay a girl forever.
Next time you come, why not pack a little lighter?
I hate even looking at that bag.
Girls always have a heavy load to bear.
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I am already high, high, high
But maybe this one suits you more, Rin-chan...
Can I try this one on too?
She just has to try this one on...
Oh, do not you like this one?!
Um, Kouki and I are going to stroll around.
See, this one is really you!
